Text:
not HD ... video is pixelated ... sharpens up when I scale down the play window to about 4x8

thanks for the up tho

Sorry, Hustler never bothered to convert older scenes like this to mp4/h264 like their newer releases. This was the best quality they had. It's funny because their flv streaming files use h264, and they could easily swap containers.

You'd be surprised how few porn sites actually have decent, professional post-production.
